paragraph.value: Also we compare performance of our model with two recent models, we see 2.39 ROUGE-1 improvements compared to the ML+RL with intra-attn approach(previous SOTA) carries over to this dataset, which is a large margin. On ROUGE-2, our model also get an im- provement of 0.51. The experiment proves that our approach can outperform competitive methods on different data distributions.
